gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.types

Class DtnTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.types.DtnTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>

    public class DtnTime
extends java.util.Date
    The DtnTime class represents a time(stamp) object in the DTN space. The RFC 5050 states that a timestamp is represented as the number of seconds between the particular point in time and 00:00:00 of 01/01/2000. Due to the size of the int type (2^32) only points in time till 02/07/2136 6:28:16 can be represented with this class
    See Also:
    RFC 5050, Serialized Form
